description: A triangle of Motzkin ballot numbers, read by rows.
comments: Mirror image of A091836. Row sums are the Motzkin numbers (A001006). T(n,n-1)=A001006(n-2) (the Motzkin numbers). T(n,n-2)=A005554(n-1).
references: M. Aigner, Motzkin numbers, Europ. J. Comb. 19 (1998), 663-675.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
